Statute.Title: Poverty Reduction Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Réduction de la pauvreté, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Employment and Social Development see SI/2025-43

CIF.Text: CIF, 2019, c. 29 (assent: 21.06.2019), ss. 9 to 12 of the Poverty Reduction Act in force 09.07.2019 see SI/2019-58
